segments.text: I notice the girl standing near the boy, her arm raised in anticipation for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a gleam in her eye that speaks of mischief in the making.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s sweet to see her so eagerly waiting, but also risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think about how easily things could go wrong with that wobbly stool beneath him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's obliviousness makes me feel a little uneasy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish she would turn around and see the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, the scene is filled with an odd charm as the children are comically collaborating.
segments.speaker: PAR
